conversations.content: Delete the agent I created for testing purposes.

tool_call: agentManager_deleteAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731639800000_u0v1w2x3y", "workspaceId": "ws_1731639800000_z4a5b6c7d", "sessionDescription": "Removing test agent", "sessionMemory": "Built test automation agent last week. Ran initial smoke tests to verify basic functionality. Agent performed as expected but no longer needed for current development cycle.", "toolContext": "Deleting completed test agent to clean up temporary resources. This agent was created for validation purposes and has served its purpose in testing workflow.", "primaryGoal": "Clean up test infrastructure", "subgoal": "Delete test agent"}, "id": "agent_test_temporary"}
Enable the coverage threshold monitor agent.

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731641600000_m8n9o0p1q", "workspaceId": "ws_1731641600000_r2s3t4u5v", "sessionDescription": "Enabling coverage monitor", "sessionMemory": "Team previously had quality gate at 75% coverage. Need to enforce this standard across all pull requests. Coverage metrics showed average of 68% in current codebase.", "toolContext": "Enabling coverage monitor agent to enforce quality standards. Using this agent ensures consistent code quality checks across all team development.", "primaryGoal": "Enforce code quality standards", "subgoal": "Enable coverage threshold monitor"}, "id": "agent_coverage_threshold_monitor", "enabled": true}
Show me all files and folders in my tests directory recursively.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731648600000_e8f9g0h1i", "workspaceId": "ws_1731648600000_j2k3l4m5n", "sessionDescription": "Listing test directory", "sessionMemory": "Project currently has 47 test files. Recently completed unit test refactoring. Need to audit test structure to ensure all tests properly organized by feature.", "toolContext": "Listing all test files recursively to verify test directory structure. This recursive listing shows complete test hierarchy for organization audit.", "primaryGoal": "Audit test structure", "subgoal": "List all test files recursively"}, "path": "/tests", "recursive": true}
Retrieve the session data from yesterday's debugging session.

tool_call: memoryManager_loadSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731654300000_g3h4i5j6k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731654300000_l7m8n9o1p", "sessionDescription": "Retrieving debug session", "sessionMemory": "Spent yesterday debugging authentication module crash that occurred in production. Identified 3 failed requests. Created detailed notes on root cause. Need to load that session to implement fix.", "toolContext": "Loading previous debug session to continue from where we left off. Retrieving session provides context on identified issues and debugging progress made.", "primaryGoal": "Continue debugging session", "subgoal": "Retrieve yesterday's debug notes"}, "sessionId": "session_1731567900000_q2r3s4t5u"}
Create a new note file for the architecture decision record.

tool_call: contentManager_createContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731655500000_c2d3e4f5g", "workspaceId": "ws_1731655500000_h6i7j8k9l", "sessionDescription": "Creating ADR document", "sessionMemory": "Team decided to adopt GraphQL for API layer. Previous decision was REST. Architecture review meeting concluded 2 days ago with consensus. Ready to document this significant architectural change.", "toolContext": "Creating architecture decision record to document today's design choice. ADR serves as historical record for why GraphQL was selected over alternatives.", "primaryGoal": "Document architecture decision", "subgoal": "Create ADR for GraphQL adoption"}, "filePath": "/docs/adr/0023-adopt-graphql.md", "content": "# ADR 023: Adopt GraphQL for API Layer

## Status
Proposed

## Context
We need to improve API flexibility and reduce over-fetching.

## Decision
Adopt GraphQL as the primary API layer.

## Consequences
- Better client-side performance
- Learning curve for team
- Need to implement caching strategy"}
Search for all console.log statements that should be removed before production.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731657100000_n4o5p6q7r", "workspaceId": "ws_1731657100000_s8t9u1v2w", "sessionDescription": "Finding debug statements", "sessionMemory": "App has 67 console.log statements scattered throughout codebase. Production release scheduled in 3 days. Need to identify all debug logs before deployment to avoid information leaks.", "toolContext": "Searching for console logging to identify debug statements that should be removed. Removing console logs improves production security and reduces noise in browser console.", "primaryGoal": "Prepare code for production release", "subgoal": "Find all console.log statements"}, "query": "console\\.log\\(|console\\.debug\\(|console\\.info\\(", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".tsx", ".js", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}

Now managing 23 total workspaces across both teams. Complete workspace inventory needed to identify consolidation opportunities post-merger.", "primaryGoal": "Audit organization infrastructure", "subgoal": "List all workspaces"}, "filters": {"organization": "acme_corp"}}
Find all API routes that don't have rate limiting configured.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731658800000_s4t5u6v7w", "workspaceId": "ws_1731658800000_x8y9z1a2b", "sessionDescription": "Finding unprotected routes", "sessionMemory": "Security audit revealed 12 endpoints exposed without rate limiting. DDoS attack last month highlighted vulnerability. Must add rate limiting to all 47 API endpoints before next release.", "toolContext": "Searching API routes to identify endpoints missing rate limiting protection. Rate limiting prevents abuse and improves API resilience against attacks.", "primaryGoal": "Improve API security", "subgoal": "Find unprotected endpoints"}, "query": "@Route\\(|router\\.get\\(|router\\.post\\(", "folder": "/src/api/routes", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}

Search for all components that use the deprecated Button component.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731660300000_n5o6p7q8r", "workspaceId": "ws_1731660300000_s9t1u2v3w", "sessionDescription": "Finding deprecated button usage", "sessionMemory": "UI library upgraded with new Button component. Finding all usages enables coordinated upgrade without breaking production.", "primaryGoal": "Upgrade UI component library", "subgoal": "Find deprecated Button usage"}, "query": "import.*Button.*from.*'@old-ui'|<OldButton|<LegacyButton", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".tsx", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Find all test files that are skipped or disabled.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731660900000_l9m1n2o3p", "workspaceId": "ws_1731660900000_q4r5s6t7u", "sessionDescription": "Finding skipped tests", "sessionMemory": "Test suite shows 19 skipped tests across codebase. Some have been skipped for 6 months. Test coverage metrics not accurate due to disabled tests. Need to fix or remove skipped tests.", "toolContext": "Locating skipped tests to improve test coverage accuracy. Skipped tests mask real coverage gaps and need to be either fixed or properly documented.", "primaryGoal": "Improve test coverage accuracy", "subgoal": "Find skipped tests"}, "query": "test\\.skip\\(|it\\.skip\\(|describe\\.skip\\(|xit\\(|xdescribe\\(", "folder": "/tests", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js", ".test.ts", ".spec.ts"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Find all React components that don't have proper PropTypes or TypeScript types.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731661800000_t3u4v5w6x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731661800000_y7z8a9b1c", "sessionDescription": "Finding untyped components", "sessionMemory": "Migrating from JavaScript to TypeScript. Approximately 34 components lack proper type definitions. This causes runtime errors and reduces IDE support. Need complete inventory for migration planning.", "toolContext": "Finding untyped React components to identify TypeScript migration targets. Adding proper types improves IDE autocomplete and prevents runtime prop errors.", "primaryGoal": "Complete TypeScript migration", "subgoal": "Find untyped components"}, "query": "export.*function.*\\(|export.*const.*=.*\\(.*\\).*=>(?!.*:.*Props)", "folder": "/src/components", "fileTypes": [".tsx", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Create a troubleshooting guide for common deployment issues.

tool_call: contentManager_createContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731662500000_w2x3y4z5a", "workspaceId": "ws_1731662500000_b6c7d8e9f", "sessionDescription": "Creating troubleshooting guide", "sessionMemory": "Team has encountered 8 different deployment failures in past month. Operations team spent 40+ hours debugging. Documenting common patterns will reduce future MTTR and improve team knowledge.", "toolContext": "Creating troubleshooting guide to capture deployment knowledge. This guide enables faster debugging and reduces operational load during incidents.", "primaryGoal": "Improve operational readiness", "subgoal": "Create deployment troubleshooting guide"}, "filePath": "/docs/ops/troubleshooting-deployment.md", "content": "# Deployment Troubleshooting

## Build Failures

### Issue: NPM install fails
- Check Node version matches .nvmrc
- Clear npm cache: `npm cache clean --force`

### Issue: TypeScript compilation errors
- Run `npm run type-check`
- Check tsconfig.json settings

## Runtime Issues

### Issue: 502 Bad Gateway
- Check application logs
- Verify health endpoint
- Check database connectivity"}
